statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, solar_intensity FROM WeatherData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60 AND solar_intensity > 800 ORDER BY humidity ASC, date DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp, AVG(humidity) AS average_humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, solar_intensity FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-08-15' AND (temperature > 20 OR humidity > 70);
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 15 OR (humidity < 60 AND solar_intensity < 500) ORDER BY date ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Researcher WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT researcher_id, location, timestamp FROM SolarData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, AVG(solar_energy_generation) AS average_energy_generation FROM SolarData GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM SolarData;
SELECT * FROM Researcher WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, affiliation FROM Researcher WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM SolarData GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 10;
SELECT MAX(solar_energy_generation) AS max_energy, MIN(solar_energy_generation) AS min_energy FROM SolarData WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT location, AVG(solar_energy_generation) AS avg_energy FROM SolarData GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_energy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT researcher_id, email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, solar_generation FROM SolarEnergy ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE institution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND precipitation < 10;
SELECT location_id, date, solar_generation FROM SolarEnergy WHERE efficiency > 0.9 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarEnergyData WHERE location = 'New York' AND energy_generated > 1000;
SELECT name, institution FROM Researchers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University of Example' AND name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT location, energy_generated, time_of_generation FROM SolarEnergyData WHERE energy_generated > 100 ORDER BY time_of_generation ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM Researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND name != 'Admin';
SELECT query_id, query_text, query_timestamp FROM DataQueries WHERE query_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_conditions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT energy_output, efficiency FROM solar_energy_generation WHERE generation_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT conclusion FROM research_results WHERE research_id = 5;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC;

SELECT research_id, researcher_name, energy_output, efficiency FROM research_data JOIN researchers ON research_data.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id JOIN solar_energy_generation ON research_data.generation_id = solar_energy_generation.generation_id ORDER BY energy_output DESC;

SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, conclusion FROM researchers JOIN research_data ON researchers.researcher_id = research_data.researcher_id JOIN research_results ON research_data.research_id = research_results.research_id WHERE conclusion LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY researcher_id;

SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, temperature, precipitation, energy_output, efficiency, conclusion FROM researchers JOIN research_data ON researchers.researcher_id = research_data.researcher_id JOIN solar_energy_generation ON research_data.generation_id = solar_energy_generation.generation_id JOIN weather_conditions ON research_data.weather_id = weather_conditions.weather_id JOIN research_results ON research_data.research_id = research_results.research_id ORDER BY temperature ASC, energy_output DESC;
